title: Top U.S. hospital operators based on number of hospitals 2019
summary: The Top U.S. Operator in the operators based was Operator CommonSpirit_Health_(Chicago_Ill.) , who made 185 hospitals .
The most U.S. Operator was Trinity_Health_(Livonia_Mich.) , with just 50 hospitals .

In second place was Operator Ascension_Health_(St._Louis) with 151 hospitals ; third place went to Operator Hospital_Corporation_of_America_(Nashville_Tenn.) with 185 hospitals ; fourth place went to Operator Atrium_Health_(Charlotte_N.C.) with 50 hospitals and fifth place went to Operator Community_Health_Systems_(Franklin_Tenn.) , who was 105 hospitals .
gold: This statistic depicts a ranking of the top U.S. for-profit hospital operators based on number of hospitals as of July 2019 . At this point , the Hospital Corporation of America , based in Nashville , Tennessee , was ranked first in the United States , with a total of 185 hospitals . Hospitals in the United States Currently , there are approximately 6,210 hospitals in the United States .
